name: Starbase One Shot
description:
Starbase : One Shot is a little game where you shoot up a Starbase and try to get to its core to destroy it. Once you've destroyed the core, don't lose any time cause you need to outrun the explosion and get back to the start !

To destroy the core, you'll need to hit it with a special missile. You've only got one of these, so if you miss your shot or don't execute the commands in time, it's over!

Thankfully for you it's only a prototype so you can play any level however you like.

You can also activate your holo-chain to grab asteroids and sling them into barriers or turrets if that's your thing. 

/!\ Experimental physics the chain WILL BREAK /!\

Game supports keyboard/mouse and controllers. Play Level 1 (Tutorial) to learn the controls in-game. Controllers are recommended, keyboard gameplay isn't optimal.

CONTROLS

Keyboard/Mouse

- WASD to move

- Shift for a boost

- LMB to shoot, aim with mouse

- F to toggle the holo-chain

- A + E for the missile launch sequence

----------------------------------------

Controller

- Left Stick to move

- L2 for a boost

- R2 to shoot, aim with Right Stick

- Square / Nintendo Y / Xbox X to toggle the holo-chain

- L1 + R1 for the missile launch sequence
